Comment: This word list has been checked, corrected and recorded in May 2016. The sounds /q/ and /x/ are allophones, they are transcribed variously. Sometimes a sequence /qx/ is heard. Vowel initial words are pronounced with an initial glottal stop which is not phonemic and not transcribed.
slight fricative sound following the uvular stop
